Package ui

Interface IslandTraderUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainCmdUI
    public interface IslandTraderUI
    Defines a user interface (UI) for a IslandTrader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean confirmQuit()
      Confirms user wants to quit the game
      void encounterPirates​(int diceThrow, boolean boardShip, java.util.ArrayList<PricedItem> transactions, boolean goodsSatisfy)
      Reports details to the user of encounter with pirates
      void encounterWeather​(int damage, int repairCost, FailureState repairValidation)
      Show the user how bad weather impacted them on their sailing.
      void processTransaction​(PricedItem transaction)
      Show the user the details of the transaction, if successful
      void quit()
      Quits the application.
      void rescueSailors​(int numRescuedSailors, PricedItem rewardRecord)
      Reports details to the user of encounter with sailors who are rescued
      void sailRoute​(Route route, PricedItem wageRecord, int sailingTime)
      Show the user what happened on their sailing
      void setup​(IslandTrader islandTrader)
      Initialises this UI and sets up the given IslandTrader, with the ships, islands, stores to be managed Once setup is complete this UI must call IslandTrader.onSetupFinished().
      void showError​(java.lang.String error)
      Reports the given error to the user.
      void start()
      Starts this UI

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup​(IslandTrader islandTrader)
        Initialises this UI and sets up the given IslandTrader, with the ships, islands, stores to be managed Once setup is complete this UI must call IslandTrader.onSetupFinished().
        Parameters:
        islandTrader - , the islandTrader game instance that this UI interacts with

      • start

        void start()
        Starts this UI

      • confirmQuit

        boolean confirmQuit()
        Confirms user wants to quit the game
        Returns:
        boolean indicating user intention to quit

      • quit

        void quit()
        Quits the application.

      • showError

        void showError​(java.lang.String error)
        Reports the given error to the user.
        Parameters:
        error - The error to display

      • processTransaction

        void processTransaction​(PricedItem transaction)
        Show the user the details of the transaction, if successful
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction

      • sailRoute

        void sailRoute​(Route route,
               PricedItem wageRecord,
               int sailingTime)
        Show the user what happened on their sailing
        Parameters:
        route - , the route being sailed
        wageRecord - , the transaction record for our wage payment
        sailingTime - , days it took to sail the route

      • encounterWeather

        void encounterWeather​(int damage,
                      int repairCost,
                      FailureState repairValidation)
        Show the user how bad weather impacted them on their sailing. If you hit bad weather it damages your ship by 20% of its total endurance. This needs to be paid before another sailing
        Parameters:
        damage - , how much damage the weather caused
        repairCost - , the extra repair cost from the weather
        repairValidation - , indicates if the user can afford repair

      • rescueSailors

        void rescueSailors​(int numRescuedSailors,
                   PricedItem rewardRecord)
        Reports details to the user of encounter with sailors who are rescued
        Parameters:
        numRescuedSailors - , the random number of sailors rescued, depends on ship size
        rewardRecord - , each sailor gives a random reward, this is the total

      • encounterPirates

        void encounterPirates​(int diceThrow,
                      boolean boardShip,
                      java.util.ArrayList<PricedItem> transactions,
                      boolean goodsSatisfy)
        Reports details to the user of encounter with pirates
        Parameters:
        diceThrow - , the random number that the user got to determine success when fighting the pirates
        boardShip - , the boolean result of the dicethrow if pirates boardded the ship
        transactions - , the record of items the pirates stole from the player
        goodsSatisfy - , boolean indicating if the goods were enough for the pirate, you lose game if false
